To set your preference, and go to Editor Edit Modes Author Messages . The following options are available:
Always open in the DITA Maps Manager - A DITA Map file is always opened in the DITA Maps Manager view.
Always open as XML - A DITA Map file is always opened in the XML editor.
Always ask - When you open a DITA Map, you are prompted to choose between opening it in the XML editor panel or in the DITA Maps Manager view.
